item.title: Oyster Anatomy Puzzle
item.description:
This image and the pieces were printed on a 3’x4’ vinyl poster and is used at various outreach events.

Access the materials here: Oyster Anatomy puzzle

item.title: R ShinyApp of Oysters in Narragansett Bay
item.description:
Check out our web app that describes the environmental conditions and oyster characteristics in Narragansett Bay: https://rjstevick.shinyapps.io/nbay_shinyapp/.

The source code can be found here: https://github.com/rjstevick/NarragansettBayShinyApp/
